1.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
choices: Elizabeth, I'm in middle school and in the sixth grade.
Shannon, I'm a freshman girl in high school.
Ryan, and I'm in middle school and in the sixth grade.
Daniel, I'm a freshman boy in high school.
Other?
1.content:
"I'm sure you will do fine sweetly." Your mother happily reassured your as she drives on the route to your new school. Above where Witches with modern broomsticks and other flying creatures. Just another part of the hustle bustle of the morning. Giants walk about on special sidewalks.

"I know mom..." You dejectedly sighed as you look at the window. Will even you see some of your friends? Will you get bullied? You didn't have time to dwell as you reached your destination. Your feet lumbered thru the car's door. With a goodbye to your parent, you began your trek to the massive front doors of"Ridgeview".

But before we start...who are you?
1.title: The first day.

choices: Sport class with a minotaur teacher
science class with a dinosaur teacher
English class with a harpy teacher
History class with a kitsune teacher
Technology class with an alien teacher
13.content:
You entered inside of your new school and quickly received your schedule. You still had a few minutes before your first class would start so you decided to take your time by walking quite slowly. As you looked around you could see countless of different types of monsters and you started to wonder how students of your class would look like ... a question that would be answered in a few minutes.

You were now near the good door in the corridor waiting for the class to start with other students. There was pretty much anything you could imagine among them: a goblin, an orc, an ogre, a vampire, a werewolf, a Kitsune etc ...

All of you were waiting in silence ... but what were you waiting for again?
13.title: Ryan's beginning

choices: he'll select someone for a tickling experience (you or anyone in this class)
he'll select someone for a foot growing experience (you or anyone in this class)
you pretend your pen fell on the ground to get a better view of their hot feet
132.content:
The teacher finally arrived after several minutes. He looked exactly like that: https://dragonquest.fandom.com/wiki/Prof...

"Alright class, it's time to start, you can come in!"

You were really surprised by the fact a dinosaur could look so wise! He really looked like an erudite. You knew it was a cliché to believe dinosaurs were only good at physical activities due to their natural strenght but you were still surprised despite that.

Everyone took a sit and your "neighbour" was a rat boy who was slightly smaller than you. In front of you on the left was a very tall and muscled orc boy, while an even taller and more muscular ogre boy was his neighbour. You were wondering how they could be barely 11/12 yo with bodies like that.

You also noticed that many students started to take their shoes and socks off in class and for some reason it caught your attention! You never really thought of feet when they belonged to humans but some monsters of your class had wonderful feet! Even your neighbour as well as the orc and the ogre removed their shoes and socks. You could see the rat boy's amazing black/grey feet (his fur had two colors), the big (human standard) beautiful green feet of the orc as well as the enormous feet of the ogre! They started to excite you more than they shoul. You were hoping no one would notice you were taking some looks at them ...

The teacher started to speak and ...
132.title: Strange science class

14.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
choices: A shorter and nerdy looking human boy.
A miffed and vulgar goblin girl.
Quiet and sarcastic Kyuubi boy.
A lazy and chill giantess.
A kind valley girl of an Amazon.
14.content:
'Well Danny boy...here we go.' You sighed as you walk through a mini-door made for people your size. Your eyes widen at the crowd of new students. Never before have you seen so many teenagers. Making you miss the good old Crumpton.

Your little body began to squeeze through numerous bodies to your homeroom. Meekily saying "excuse me" to anyone you so happen to bumped into. Once you are finally freed from the horde's grasp, you saw your destination. There you began to speedwalk towards it...only to roughly bump into.

Your poor butt ached as you just collapsed into the floor. As you tenderly rubbed it you saw that you bumped into..
14.title: A great start to the school year!

142.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
choices: A meek-looking mouse-boy. He was reading a book.
The same girl from before! Her feet were uncaringly crossed on the desk.
A gloomy and anxious looking succubus. She was doing her nails.
142.content:
"Watch were you were goin'! You chicken legged bag of cunts!" A somewhat shrieky yet undoubtedly girlish voice hissed. It had an..odd Irish or cockney british twine. Despite its innate shrillness, it sounds…kinda adorable. You frightfully look all around so you can apologize to the girl. But the …the only thing you saw quickly emptying hallway.

"Down here ya' no good pig-brained simpleton!"

"Um...sorry?"You obliged and looked down to...only to find a goblin chick. Her skin was a dark green and her long bright cherry red hair was styled in a spiky ponytail. Her nose and ears was a sharply pointed, the latter is a trait that all of the members of the "Elvin" family possesses. Her eyes were a dark golden. Her lips formed a sneer, revealing her sharp little fangs.

"Tch whatever...numbnut." The four foot and nine inches tall girl growled as she walks to the very classroom you are assigned to. Which you shortly followed There you saw that she was wearing. A simple red tank top that concealed her rather modest-sized breasts. But despite the bagginess of her jean shorts, she clearly got a lot of junk in the trunk. And your eyes lowered at her feet...which was about more than a quarter than her body's size! The big things were brawny and wide, was clad in an old brown strapped sandals. The underfoot was a much lighter shade of green.

Your face began to heat up and causing briskly walk past the goblin. Making her think there is something wrong with your head. Your booty was planted firmly in a desk in the back. You never liked being in front.

'That was awkward as hell..I hope the rest of my day isn't ruined.' A hopeful little smile began to form on your face. Because yeah! The day isn't over yet! Your ears heard the telltale signs that someone is behind you.'Better go greet my desk mate!'

With your smile growing in friendliness as you turn to see...
142.title: Wikihow don't fail me...now!

choices: The teacher interrupts you two
One of the students interrupts you
You spend the day with your new bully
1422.content:
Just as quickly as it showed up, the smile on your face disappeared; the pissed off bombshell goblin you met earlier was sitting right behind you! Not only was it really awkward to have to sit by a girl you just made a terrible first impression on, you were also greeted to the breathtaking sight (in more ways than one) of her thick, enormous bare soles. They're so big that you can't even see her face past them...

"Ugh...I just 'ad to pick the seat behind this bumbling bugger..." she mumbled to herself, apparently not even deigning to speak to you. Seriously, how rude could she be?

She wiggled and flexed her toes, making sure to get them up in your face. At one point, she even pinched your nose between them! The worst part was that your body was reacting on its own; you involuntarily inhaled her sweaty, vinegary stench—it was so potent that you thought she had ran more than a mile non-stop just to get here—and soon after felt a tent begin to grow in your pants. A luminescent blush spread across your cheeks. What the hell was going on?!

The sides of her lips perk up. "...well, at least I'll 'ave fun messin' wit 'im."

You open your mouth to defend yourself, only to have a couple of her meaty digits pop in past your teeth, introducing their rich, salty flavor to your poor taste buds. You sputter, too stunned to push her feet away. The invading toes rest comfortably on your tongue for a few seconds, scrubbing across it, even squeezing it a bit, before they pull back out. They leave a strong aftertaste that makes you feel weird and fuzzy inside, and that blush is definitelynot going away any time soon. The goblin parts her feet to smirk at you, obviously pleased with her handiwork.

For a moment, the sight leads you to absentmindedly conclude that she could fit your face snugly in the arches of her soles. Your erection grows tighter.

"I guess you're no' worthless after all, 'umie," she states, looking quite proud of herself. "You migh' be a dope, but you know how to 'elp a girl out. Maybe you can work on these numbers after school, huh?"

You've come back to reality, at least for now. Instead of yelling at her (something you really wanted to do, but you refrained from for some odd reason), you just give her a questioning look; she rolls her eyes in return. She moves her hand down to pick up her brown leather sandals, which she left down at the side of her desk, and shakes them. "These numbers down here, you dim-witted bellend!"

You look to the side, embarrassed—wait, why are you letting her get to you this way?—and stutter out a simple, "I, uh..."

She bops your nose with one of her big toes and moves it back down to your lips, which you keep closed this time. Your tormentor looks unamused. "Shut up, I like you be'er when you're silent."

---

This little charade goes on a bit longer before class actually starts. What happens?

Option A) The goblin is stopped by your 1st hour teacher, Ms. Keri. She is a young, but firm tiefling with small red horns on her forehead. She's sympathetic to your plight, but is also rather turned on by the little display you and your goblin 'friend' are giving. She might prevent this kind of thing from happening in the future, but the slight sexual awakening she's had from witnessing you getting dominated might not end in a way that is convenient for you.

Option B) One of your classmates butts into the conversation. Whether that's to your benefit or detriment is up to them.

Option C) This goblin girl gets you all to herself for the rest of the day. She's in your other classes, too!
1422.title: Bullied by the Goblin Girl.

choices: This class ends, onto the next one...
You get into trouble!
14223.content:
The teacher entered the classroom and the bell rang out shortly after, signaling the start of your first class. The goblin girl frowned and took her feet away from your face, something that filled you with both relief and disappointment.

You turn forward and you start taking notes and paying attention to the teacher, keen on on spending the rest of the day normally. But that wasn't going to happen, not as long as your goblin classmate had a say in the matter...

She constantly teased you as you attempted to pay attention to the admittedly boring subject. Poking and prodding your back with her grubby toes, resting her feet on the desk and letting their rank smell assault your nostrils... worst of all the blush and erection were not fading at all, they were growing stronger with your bully's efforts! The hell was going on with your body?

At one point, you turn around towards her and whisper out: "Could you please stop it? I'm trying to pay attention to the teacher!"
The goblin girl simply scoffed and retorted back: "Aw don't pretend yer not enjoyin' this ya daft mutt! I see yer red cheeks and that tent in yer pants, so zip it and let me ave some fun!"

With your cheeks glowing redder than ever. "Alright, alright! Just be quieter!" You say out in defeat and you turn back forward, prompting the green bombshell to smirk smugly and resume teasing you with her soles...
14223.title: A promising first class...

145.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
choices: ...the girl who you bumped into earlier.
...haughty and prim looking dragon girl. She is as big as the first one!
... short emo and a grunge-looking catgirl. Great...an egdelord.
145.content:
"Oh my gosh, …are you like okay! You totes fell pretty hard..." A shadow loomed over you as you saw a massive hand with neon pink colored manicured nails. Easily lifting you up, like you weight like a dainty little feather. There you stare face to face of a young teenaged Amazon. Her skin was a light olive color with long light sandy blond hair that looks so soft. The ten foot and half tall girl's lips were a slightly shiny, a clear sign of lip gloss. What she wears for clothing on their slim yet muscular body of hers was a simple pink shirt and yellow skirt. Her bust were plump yet tamed, complementing her athletic frame very nicely. On her mighty feet, were a pair of sparkly white mules. Her right foot has a golden anklet with pink heart shaped gems.

"Yeah…I'm fine." You weezed as look away from the girl and quickly walk away. Your cheeks felt like they were are on fire while your second head is very much awake. You felt every single beat of your young heart as you walk to the homeroom's door. 'Jesus H. Christ…wr didn't have THAT in middle school.'

Until now, amazons have always been normal looking girls to you. If not more active and…sporty. Sure they often stand at heights of six or seven feet, and could easily outshine any average athlete at everything. All at the tender age eleven. But they still look like perfectly normal young girls.

But apparently...puberty hits them like a meteor.

As the boy entered the room, The naive blue-eyed Amazon or better known as Alondra was saddened. She totes didn't mean to scare the little guy! But luckily she can get to know him better, since they have the same homeroom.

As you quickly sat down in a nearest available desk, you noticed the teacher wasn't there. You scanned as teens of all races coming in the classroom. Some chattering it up, others roughhoused and tell jokes amongst themselves. You just awkwardly stared at them all, feeling out of place. And to make it worse, someone apparently decided to sit next to you.

With a big gulp, you turn your head to see a…
145.title: A kind valley girl of an Amazon.

choices: She asks if you want to go back to her house after school
She asks more about you
Before she can speak, the teacher comes in
1451.content:
"Like, hey there." You hear in an all-too-familiar voice. You shakily turn to see the Amazon girl from before. "I'm like, totes sorry if I scared you out there. I was hoping we could try again. The name's Alondra." She extends a hand out to you.

Hesitantly, you reach out to meet her hand. "D-Daniel." You stutter as you're still a bit embarrassed at look at her... defined body so closely. "It's okay. You just startled me is all."

"I get ya. We Amazons can be hella startling when ya don't expect us." She grabs your hand, only instead of shaking it, she uses it to pull you into her cleavage. "I'm more of 'hugging' type'a gal."

Out of the corner of your eye, you see some of the roughhousing boys take notice of you two as they pointed you out and laughed among themselves. Your face goes even redder at the realization that they might use this to give you hell later. As you remain trapped in her embrace, you can't help but feel her toned and muscled body press against yours. You look up to see that she seems ready to say something.
1451.title: ...the girl who you bumped into earlier.

choices: Alondra the amazon girl
Another group to meet even more people
14511.content:
Alondra then suggested something you were not expecting coming from a girl you just met.

"Would you like to go to my house once school is finished?"

You were very excited by her proposition but you were wondering why she suggests you come to considering you were perfect strangers to each other a few minutes earlier.

"I ... I'd love to but I'd like to know ... why me?"

"Simply because I never met humans before and I'd like to know you a bit more and besides we've got amazing things where I live: for example we've got an ENORMOUS training field near my house"

* If that's enormous for her then it's gonna be gigantic for me * You thought. Anyway, Alondra seemed happy and smiled at you as she was waiting for your reply.

"O ... ok, let's meet after school!"

"Awesome! Can't wait for that moment to arrive!"

Alondra seemed to relax a bit and put her right leg on her left leg and since you were on her left then her big foot was very very close to you ... and it made you feel very "excited". You imagined yourself massaging her huge feet or licking them for example. But the teacher's arrival interrupted your dreams.

"Hello, Class! I'm Mr. Ronk and yes I know I don't exactly look like a maths teacher but that's my role"

Indeed, Mr. Ronk was a tall minotaur, typically the kind of teacher you wouldn't see teaching maths. The class went normally and you noticed a few things:

There were some teen orcs (boys) who were even taller than Alondra (the smallest orc is easily 14 ft tall perhaps even more), they do not seem very brilliant in class but they weren't dunces neither. You also noticed a short (5 ft tall) harpie girl with glasses who seemed very good in class: she answered more than half of questions herself. There were some teen ogres (boys) who seemed even taller than orcs who're themselves already taller than Alondra (the smallest one seems to be at least 20 ft tall). Orcs and ogres seemed quite popular among other students: perhaps because they're in a sports club or something. There were also some goths students (both females and males): some mouse boys/girls, rat boys/girls as well as some goblin boys/girls, all of them seemed rather short (the tallest of their group being 5 ft tall at best). There are also some gnolls who seemed "average" (neither popular nor popular). They were taller than humans (9 ft tall) but still smaller than amazons like Alondra.

The genius harpie girl also seemed to be friend with some elves (boys and girls) with a classic human size but they all seemed smart and elegant. You took some time to observe the group of goths and you noticed they were joined by a few dark elves and vampires who had a human size.

Finally, you noticed that some demons (boys/girls) of various races and heights were talking with some yokais (girls/boys of various heights races) and some dragons (boys and girls). They seemed to be specialists in magic.

There are also a few more races/groups.

Once the two hours of maths class were over, the recreation was about to start. Who will you hang out with? (regardless of who you choose, you'll still meet Alondra and she won't be mad at you regardless of who you hand out with).
14511.title: Meeting after school?

choices: one of the group mentioned in this chapters
I'll create my own group
145112.content:
[Yeah I know: it's a choice chapters but since I could only tell 2 options per chapter that's the best I can do to allow people to choose what they really want]

Oh? So you want to hang out with someone else than Alondra? You can choose among those groups:

Jocks: they're popular and all of them are very very tall and very very muscular. They're all boys (at least those in your class). You can hang out with orc boys (at least 14 ft tall) or ogre boys (at least 20 ft tall). There might be more races/genders during the recreation, this is only for your class.

Brainies: not the most popular ones, they're good in class and have good grades. Expect a harpie girl as well as some elves (both genders). There might be more races/genders during the recreation, this is only for your class.

Specialists in magic: mystic group of students who try to master great powers. People think they're cool but only a few persons know what they really do. You can expect demons of various genders, heights and races as well as dragons (various genders, heights and races but they're all tall). There might be more races/genders during the recreation, this is only for your class.

Goths: Neither popular nor impopular. They're quite discreet ... expect vampires (both genders), dark elves (both genders), goblins (both genders), mourse and rats (both genders). All of them are either quite shrot or average in size. There might be more races/genders during the recreation, this is only for your class.

Average: people who're neither popular nor impopular. You can find some gnolls among the ones in your class (there might be more). There might be more races/genders during the recreation, this is only for your class.
145112.title: Another group

choices: Jaocks or brainies
Goths, specialists of magic or average
1451121.title: one of the group mentioned in this chapters

choices: Jocks: their big feet height and muscle are amazing!
brainies: you think they're elegent and smart
14511211.content: Jocks or brainies right? That's literally like choosing between the Earth or the Sky since they're completely different. Who will you select!
14511211.title: Jaocks or brainies

choices: Goths or specialists, please! I love people who love dark stuff!
Average people, please!
14511212.content: Goth and specializes in magic seem similar but they have in fact different cultures even if they both look like they like to talk about dark stuff. You can also try the average people.
14511212.title: Goths, specialists of magic or average

choices: goths
Specialists in magic!
145112121.content: You can choose to meet with specialists in spells and those who love dark stories. Who will you select?
145112121.title: spell casters or dark story tellers

choices: Ren a boy in middle school
Somil a boy in elementary school
Mickey a boy in high school
Janine a girl in high school
Other
15.content: Okay who do you want to be then?
15.title: Other?

choices: Math taught by a Holstaur
Science Taught by a spider like creature
Art Taught by a Kitsune
Choir Taught by a Siren
151.content:
Ren was a twelve year old boy with ash blond hair and green eyes. He wore a maroon beret and had a short sleeved shirt with black and white stripes and baggy pants. Ren was art prodigy he was good at 2 dimensional art especially painting. Unlike most schools Ridgeview was both a middle school and high school. Who thought of putting tiny little sixth graders with seniors was unknown to Ren but he knew he had to tread carefully.

Ren made his way to the front of the school and got his schedule and saw what his first class was and who it was taught by.

(note whatever you pick Ren's teacher will be a girl)
151.title: Prince of Paint

choices: Andrea the red head 16 year old
Other
155.title: Other

choices: Take em off
Not yet
Other
1551.content:
You sit next to Andrea in your Spanish class and you aren’t necessarily friends but one day your teacher gives you a project and you two end up being partners. This is a very important project and you need a good grade on this to pass the class. You are given the word PIE (Foot) to do your project on. After class she meets up with you in the hallway.

“Hey wait up!” She says

“What is it Andrea?”

“I was wondering if you would come over to my house to work on our project.”

“Yeah sure I’m free around 5:00.”

“That works for me.” She says walking off

That evening you arrived at her house and knock on the door. She opens it and you realize her parents aren’t home.

“Come in.” She says nicely

You take a glance at her feet to see what she’s is wearing. She has a pair of black and white converse shoes on with neon pink socks underneath. She takes you to her room and she brings out a poster board for your project.

“What was our word again?”

“Pie (foot)” you say

“Oh right we have to do it on feet. What were the requirements again?”

“We need a picture and a paragraph describing our word.” You say

“Sounds easy enough” she says optimistically “your a really good drawer so you can draw the picture.”

“Well I really need a source to look off of to draw really well.”

“I’ve got you covered there.” She says taking off the converse shoes revealing a pair of sweaty pink socks. You get a small erection from the smell which had a hint of Doritos to it. “Should I take off the socks too or is this ok.”
1551.title: Andrea the red head 16 year old

info.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
info.brief_description: Just the daily misadventures of a kid in school and stuff. Nothing to see here
info.description:
Yo Writing com! This is my second interactive. This one is inspired by Kamu's monster stories and Brainsewage. Well here are the rules:

1. Please for the love of god, know how to use grammar, spacing, and punctuations. I'm not saying ya have to be Stephen Hawking, but still.

2. No short chapters! Keep a minimum of two to three paragraphs. I will give leniency on choice chapters, bjt don't continuously make them

3. Sexual content in the Middle school choices will be a strong Pg-13 and maybe borderline rated R. While the high school will be rated R lite.

4. No toilet, TG, limb expansion or inflation, or vore whatsoever. I will allow moderate muscle growth, some shrinking/growing, and other stuff like that.

5. And for size changing and giants are allowed since are monsters and aliens walk the earth and intend the school as students or faculty. And thus coexisting with humans. But you can definitely change back to normal.

7. Make character act their age and such. No super badass ten years wielding guns and acting like hardened soldiers. :v

8. And while I'm straight. You can play and interact with both boys and girl characters.

9. And while foot fetish is the main kink of this story. It doesn't mean that you blind to a character's other "assets" *eyebrow wiggle*. But be warned, this isn't exactly pure smut(and it can be close). But playful mocking and teasing is very much allowed and is encouraged. ;D

10. Not every foot have to smell like a cheese factory, nor do they smell like a field of daisies. Same goes for size and texture. Think for example orges! Do you really think those big brutes would have soft dainty feet that smell like roses do you?
10.1. Note for certain creatures their definition of "big feet" is going to be a little bit different from ours...heh.
10.2. This extends also to people as a whole. Not everyone is a short and slim elf nor is a tall and buff minotaur. People are different. Be descriptive.

11. Your choices do matter in the long run and shape the main character's personality. And remember while you are free to do whatever you want. But remember, you aren't free from the consequences of said actions.
11.1. The protagonist is going through puberty...take that as you will. :v

12. Keep it either first person pov or second person pov. And that has a name. And their age in the middle school storylines are going to be twelve to thirteen years and for high school ones, it is going to be fifteen to sixteen.

13. No crossovers. This is a purely original story.

14. Final rule! Where a monster is from will decide their ancestry. For example, a Kyuubi would be a Japanese American and A dark elf will be Nordic American.

TO PROMOTE STORY GROWTH, I WILL BE GIVING OUT TWO HUNDRED AND FIFTY GIFT POINTS TO GOOD ADDITIONS!

Here are monthly lists for creatures of interest. Any good chapter for these will be rewarded with three and four hundred gp.

June:

1. Fish people

2. Undead

3. Sirens

4. Lizardmen

5. Faries

6. Humans
